============================================
core/directives/macro_args
============================================

`Dff(5, 7)

----

(source_file
  (text_macro_usage
    (simple_identifier)
    (list_of_actual_arguments
      (actual_argument
        (param_expression
          (mintypmax_expression
            (expression
              (primary
                (primary_literal
                  (integral_number
                    (decimal_number
                      (unsigned_number)))))))))
      (actual_argument
        (param_expression
          (mintypmax_expression
            (expression
              (primary
                (primary_literal
                  (integral_number
                    (decimal_number
                      (unsigned_number))))))))))))
